Key Match Events: The Washington Wizards lost to the New Orleans Pelicans with a final score of 110-98.
The Pelicans had a strong start, which contributed to their victory.
Wizards forward Kyle Kuzma mentioned that the team came out flat and tense at the beginning of the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Kyle Kuzma expressed that the Wizards need to play well from the beginning to be more competitive.
The Wizards' inconsistency throughout the season has been a recurring issue.
